title: thebloodmaster
author: thebloodmaster
content: hey i sended btc from 1 bet site to another sadly the first did sent with way to low fee now its stuck and i cant acclerate it or use viabtc cuz volume is over 0.5kb anybody who could help accleratae it ? thx in advance

comments.author: Cuenta Alternativa
comments.body: If you have sent it from one gambling site address to another, if I have understood you correctly, I think there is little you can do. If it were a transaction that you had made with your keys, leaving RBF, you could bump the fee, but not in the situation you describe. Can you share the tx id? Then we can tell you better expectations of when it could be confirmed. The good news is that the mempool unconfirmed txs have diminished and fees have come down. Let's see if it empties out even more over the weekend.

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Since you control neither the sending wallet nor the receiving wallet, then you cannot use either RBF nor CPFP. There are no free accelerators other than ViaBTC. Your only remaining option is to privately pay a miner to include your transaction if you are that desperate for a confirmation. You can also do this via ViaBTC, but the cost is usually quite high.

comments.author: nc50lc
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on May 13, 2023, 06:03:04 AM-snip- and i cant acclerate it or use viabtc cuz volume is over 0.5kb anybody who could help accleratae it ?Unfortunately, every acceleration service here in the forum is a blatant lie that does nothing but re-broadcast your transaction.Excluding those who can confirm that they solo mine Bitcoin with good chance of mining blocks or owns a mining pool.If it didn't qualify to ViaBTC's free accelerator, then there's nothing more you can do but wait.Paying for accelerating it wont be cheap since you'll be paying for the whole batch withdrawal's transaction.

comments.author: thebloodmaster
comments.body: ok thx guys  https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/f16ee4c4c5f9faa179ce5a835b48e376326cfb339fa83beb92fc807f4be639ac that would be the txid

comments.author: thebloodmaster
comments.body: Quote from: nc50lc on May 13, 2023, 07:25:29 AMQuote from: thebloodmaster on May 13, 2023, 06:03:04 AM-snip- and i cant acclerate it or use viabtc cuz volume is over 0.5kb anybody who could help accleratae it ?Unfortunately, every acceleration service here in the forum is a blatant lie that does nothing but re-broadcast your transaction.Excluding those who can confirm that they solo mine Bitcoin with good chance of mining blocks or owns a mining pool.If it didn't qualify to ViaBTC's free accelerator, then there's nothing more you can do but wait.Paying for accelerating it wont be cheap since you'll be paying for the whole batch withdrawal's transaction.back in the day like 2017 their were ppl here for acclerated them for free so i wondered if this still existy its 100$ atm bit harsh i know i would do rbf if could but as its not my "wallet" i cant

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on May 13, 2023, 08:03:23 AMback in the day like 2017 their were ppl here for acclerated them for freeNo they didn't, they only claimed they accelerated transactions.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on May 13, 2023, 06:03:04 AMhey i sended btc from 1 bet site to another sadly the first did sent with way to low fee now its stuck and i cant acclerate it or use viabtc cuz volume is over 0.5kb anybody who could help accleratae it ? thx in advanceI assume that gambling site has customer support, and the only option you have at the moment is to contact them and ask them nicely to increase the fee, because the transaction is marked with RBF. On the other hand, you can hope that you will be lucky with mempool because currently transactions are going through with about 30 sat/vB, and yours has 21 sat/vB.

comments.author: Cuenta Alternativa
comments.body: Quote from: ormatr on May 13, 2023, 09:13:52 AMThe knowledge you have on bitcoin suggests either you are Satoshi Nakamoto or someone from his team. The knowledge he has about many things suggests that he is a very bright person, but the sentence you quote is not surprising for anyone with a minimum of technical knowledge. Quote from: thebloodmaster on May 13, 2023, 08:02:22 AMok thx guys  https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/f16ee4c4c5f9faa179ce5a835b48e376326cfb339fa83beb92fc807f4be639ac that would be the txidThe transaction could take up to a day to be confirmed if things do not change. The bad thing with estimates is that they can change. If there is a large dump of spam transactions as there has been recently, it will take much longer, and if unconfirmed transactions continue to drop as they have been lately, it may take longer to confirm. The bad thing is that you can't do much more than what has already been mentioned in the thread.Wasn't there an option in the casino for fast withdrawal?

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Low prio as per mempool is around 29 sat/vb and the medium-high is 31 sat/vb. So, that's close to your 21 sat/vByte. But the thing here is, we don't know how long or when it shall reach that fee you've made. There's no option but just to wait until a miner confirms that.Hopefully the fee goes lower with sats/vb and then it'll meet yours.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on May 13, 2023, 08:02:22 AMok thx guys  https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/f16ee4c4c5f9faa179ce5a835b48e376326cfb339fa83beb92fc807f4be639ac that would be the txidGambling sites usually use high fees when you are withdrawing from them but it's interesting they only used 21 sat per vbyte. Mempool is going back to normal slowly but it will still require good amount of time to get this transaction confirmed. I think you have no other option but to wait.Quote from: Lucius on May 13, 2023, 10:02:54 AMQuote from: thebloodmaster on May 13, 2023, 06:03:04 AMhey i sended btc from 1 bet site to another sadly the first did sent with way to low fee now its stuck and i cant acclerate it or use viabtc cuz volume is over 0.5kb anybody who could help accleratae it ? thx in advanceI assume that gambling site has customer support, and the only option you have at the moment is to contact them and ask them nicely to increase the fee, because the transaction is marked with RBF. On the other hand, you can hope that you will be lucky with mempool because currently transactions are going through with about 30 sat/vB, and yours has 21 sat/vB.I dealt with may casino customer support and unfortunately I found none of them have good knowledge about blockchain and how it works. The chances for this casino support will be slim too.@OP, which one was the site you withdraw the balance?

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: How long do you think he has to wait before his transaction goes through without having to pay a miner to pick his tx to accelerate?  Would it take a week?Because the miners have the option to pick the transactions with higher priority fees, they will only pick those transactions after all it's more profitable. If it takes a week because all miners skipped his transaction, it really is discouraging.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on May 13, 2023, 08:03:23 AMback in the day like 2017 their were ppl here for acclerated them for free so i wondered if this still existy its 100$ atm bit harsh i know i would do rbf if could but as its not my "wallet" i cantThere are still free accelerators here in our present times but these free accelerators are not directly interacting with the blockchain they are just rebroadcasting your transaction and it is requesting that it be added for verification. It is a request and not a demand and the miners can choose to ignore it in favor of transactions with higher fees orso when there is network congestion don't expect too much on the free accelerator.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Unfortunately, there is nothing we/you can do to accelerate this transaction aside from submitting it to viabtc accelerator.You are withdrawing coins from a custodial service and transferring it to another custodial service. If you want real help then you should refer to one of those services.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: Cuenta Alternativa on May 13, 2023, 07:12:17 AMIf you have sent it from one gambling site address to another, if I have understood you correctly, I think there is little you can do. The good news is that the mempool unconfirmed txs have diminished and fees have come down. Let's see if it empties out even more over the weekend. Gambling sites as well as centralized exchanges usually use very high fee rates when they broadcast transactions for user withdrawal request and they did not use RBF in many transactions. They believe that with high fee rate, their transactions will be confirmed by miners.You don't control the sending wallet (gambling site control it)or receiving address,  no choice to use RBF or CPFP. You only can wait and hope that today your confirmation will be confirmed. If it won't be confirmed in next 24 hours, last day of this weekend, it is very possibly that it will be stucked 6 more days at least before a next weekend.What is your txid?With this mempoo there is hope that your transaction will be confirmed to day if fee rate is 25+ or better 30+ sat/vbyte. If your fee rate is like 20+ sat/vbyte or lower, your chance will be smaller.

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.created_time: May 14, 2023, 07:36:29 AMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 09:10:34 AM by o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on May 13, 2023, 09:17:11 PMHow long do you think he has to wait before his transaction goes through without having to pay a miner to pick his tx to accelerate?  Would it take a week?OP's transaction is now around 4 MvB from the tip of the mempool. If he is lucky, it could confirm within an hour. If he is unlucky and the mempool fills rapidly again as it has been doing recently, it might not confirm for days yet. Impossible to predict at the moment.Quote from: robelneo on May 13, 2023, 09:56:15 PMIt is a request and not a demand and the miners can choose to ignore it in favor of transactions with higher fees orso when there is network congestion don't expect too much on the free accelerator.It isn't even a request. It is just a rebroadcast. Since OP's transaction is already in (almost) every node's mempool, rebroadcasting will achieve absolutely nothing. Every node which receives the rebroadcast will just ignore it, since they are already aware of the transaction.Edit: It's confirmed.
